revision.text: [[File:MainMenu.png|thumb|The main menu in {{dw|Hell_Revealed_II|HR2}}.]]The '''player setup''' regroups the different options that relate to player appearance, such as the displayed name, gender, and skin, The main menu appears when hitting any key on the titlescreen or when hitting the Escape key during a game. Its [[MENUDEF]] name is <tt>MainMenu</tt> and it can be summoned with the {{CCMD|O|menu_main}} console command. Its content varies slightly from game to game: *'''[[New game menu]]''' :{{c|{{CCMD|O|menu_game}}}} :Allows to start a new game. *'''[[Options menu]]''' :{{c|{{CCMD|O|menu_options}}}} :Allows to change settings and options in [[ZDoom]]. *'''[[Load game menu]]''' :{{c|{{CCMD|O|menu_load}}}} :Allows to resume a game from a save. *'''[[Save game menu]]''' :{{c|{{CCMD|O|menu_save}}}} :Allows to save the ongoing game. Accessing it is denied if not currently within a game. *'''[[Game files menu]]''' :Allows to access the save and load menus. [[Heretic]] and [[Hexen]] use this menu instead of the previous two. *'''[[Info menu]]''' :{{c|{{CCMD|O|menu_help}}}} :Also called '''Read this!''', merely displays the help screens in sequence. *'''[[Quit menu]]''' :{{c|{{CCMD|O|menu_quit}}}} :Displays a random message asking for confirmation and closes the program. [[Category:Menus]]
